alert.note: Alert for San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 18 at 2:31PM CST until December 18 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central San Patricio County in south central Texas... * Until 315 PM CST. * At 231 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Odem, or 7 miles southwest of Sinton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sinton, Taft, Odem, Gregory, Edroy and Taft Southwest. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 18 and 23. US Highway 181 between mile markers 620 and 636. US Highway 77 between mile markers 638 and 658. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
